 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁ֫קֶת‎</span>, [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁ֫קֶת‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==watering-trough== ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:95f»§ 95f</sup> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xli (1887), 605</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***irrigating canal***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***watering-place, drinking vessel***); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׁ‎</span> [[Gen.24.20|Gen 24:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁקֲתוֺת הַמַּיִם‎</span> [[Gen.30.38|Gen 30:38]] ([[BDB#J|J]]).
